name: Nice and cozy apartment in Kreuzberg, Graefekiez
description: Our cosy two room Apartment (70qm) in a vibrating neighbourhood gives you a perfect base for your stay in Berlin. It is located in a quite street, close to Parks, public transport, the canals and bars. Explore the city with our bikes and feel at home

name: Modernes, neues Studioappartment in Berlin
description:
Sit back and relax – in this quiet, stylish accommodation in two state-of-the-art rooms in a quiet yet central location in Berlin-Steglitz in the immediate vicinity of the S-Bahn line 25, several buses and the city park.
The apartment meets all the requirements for everyday needs and convinces with its high-quality design.

name: Luxus Studio 100
description:
Our luxury studio offers you an extraordinary stay in Berlin.
Enjoy luxurious living quality in a spacious living & dining area with open, fully equipped kitchen with MIELE appliances.
The 100 m² apartment has a separate bedroom with built-in closets and TV.
The shower room with rain shower.
The large living and dining area with couch, sofa bed and dining area, TV and stereo.
Enjoy the spacious balcony.
A guest toilet with washing machine and dryer.

name: :Spacious room with balcony:Kreuzberg:Neukölln:
description: Dear guests, our nice shared flat is located in the district of Neukölln. We live in a typical, charming Berlin old house built in the 19th century with high ceilings and beautiful wooden floors and doors. Neukölln is a great urban and multicultural quarter with many cozy cafés and pretty bars. Hasenheide park, former Tempelhof airport and the canal in Kreuzberg are just round the corner as well as various supermarkets, foodmarkets and restaurants with delicious and affordable international food

name: Spacious room in the heart of Berlin - Ostbahnhof!
description: In the heart of berlin, this room is conveniently located in Friedrichshain (1 minute walk from Ostbahnhof station). The room newly renovated, is extremely spacious and quite bright all day long! Its perfect for singles and couples, though can also accommodate a small child on the comfy sofa. The house has all the required amenities, including a washing machine, dishwasher, fridge, iron, etc. I will be hosting you in this house and will happily tend to any of your queries.

name: Light & cozy living in Neukoelln
description:
The flat is located in NEUKÖLLN, one of the most popular areas in Berlin!
Why? Because it's ideal for so many life styles. For travellers, it's attractive too, because it suits both, the relaxed stay and the wild stay. In the following, I will give you some advice to parks, coffee places, cinemas, clubs and bars, too. But also some hints on where you got your basics from. Whenever you got questions, my lovely flat mates will be staying with you. Or you can just contact me whenever you want to!

name: Nordberliner Sommerhaus
description: Welcome to our summer house in the north of Berlin! Perfect retreat in the garden, close to Alexanderplatz (25 min by tram/subway). Several shopping options and tram stops within walking distance (3 min). Small, detached 70 sqm house with fully equipped kitchen, dining area, bathroom with shower, sauna, and air conditioning (optional for an additional fee), washing machine, garden use with garden furniture, WLAN, and HD television.

name: Lux Central 1BD Terrace Oasis
description:
Indulge in the convenience of being just a few kilometers away from Berlin's most renowned locations. Explore the historic significance of Checkpoint Charlie, absorb the lively atmosphere at Alexanderplatz, delve into cultural treasures on Museuminsel, and indulge in retail therapy at nearby shopping malls. The allure of Gendarmenmarkt and more awaits just moments from your doorstep.
Step into a stylish retreat that seamlessly combines modern elegance with homely comfort.

name: Charming and spacious Berlin alt-bau apartment
description: Beautiful alt-bau apartment in northern Prenzlauer berg, full of light, character, space and charm. Equipped with everything you need for a short or long stay in Berlin. Seconds away from Tram and public transport - 15 min to Alexanderplatz and Mitte, within minutes to the restaurants and bars of Prenzlauer berg.

name: Nice room in a new house near Tier Park
description:
The room is on the quiet side of the house, with enough space for 2 people. It has a 140cm bed, chairs to sit down and a closet.

*** NOTE The house is 40 mins from the city. If you just want to be in the city center please Do Not book!

name: 18-Beautiful single room apartment in Schöneberg
description: Wonderful design Apartments right in the heart of happening Schöneberg. A vibrant neighbourhood that is full a great restaurants and coffee shops. The nearest transport is Nollendorfplatz station  plus you are a short trip away from Berlin famous Ku’damm high street.

name: Luxury Penthouse with 3 Terraces and AC
description: Our 180 sq meter home + 35 sqm terrace in SO36 has 2 bathrooms/showers, 3 double bedrooms (one of which is a nursery but can have a bed instead) & 3 terraces. Extremely central yet very quiet. Bright and sunny, it is 2 minutes from Berlin's best market, close to public transport (U1/U8/Bus), nightlife, East Side gallery, the river & more. We live in a family building and we like our neighbors so please, no parties. Great neighborhood for foodies! Please, only AirBnBers with at least 1 review.

name: Berlin, 100m2 Altbau in Wilmersdorf
description:
The appartment is currently in a pretty well state. Fully furnitured. It is a cosy 100m2 flat in Wilmersdorf, Berlin. Really interesting and quiet area close to Grünewald, Tegel, Charlottenburg, Schöneberg.

The house is a typical Berlin building with an elevator, quiet and nice neighbors. According to arrange we dispose of two bicicles for our guest.

name: Schniekes Zimmer im Rigaerkiez!
description:
Our house is right across from a well-known occupied house in Berlin. Correspondingly, the atmosphere here is also. Everything is very colorful, there is always something going on, overall very pleasant and likeable. You still feel like you can be part of the real Berlin with its diversity and rebellious charm, and that in the city center.

And of course you also have a bar under you, which you can also hear on weekends (times more, sometimes less, sometimes not at all).

name: Simple beautiful comfy room
description: Close to the city's center, this room is part of a quiet house in the central western side of Berlin. Busses, metro and train bring you fast to the airports, west berlin ceter and all Ring Stations.  There are various supermarkets nearby.

description:

name: Berlin Wannsee Landgut
description: The apartment is ideal for families or friends, pets are also welcome. If you like it quiet and close to nature and yet want to have the cities of Berlin, Potsdam around the corner, this is the place to be. There is a private entrance, terrace and Garden. Living room with kitchen and a double bed. One bedroom upstairs with a single bed as well as a king size bed and oversized duvets. We live next door, so never an access or key issue. We are close to the  train. Griebnitzsee and Wannsee. Free parking.

name: Newly built, beautiful Premium Penthouse Loft
description: Newly built, fully furnished and equipped, beautifully styled 45m2 premium penthouse loft in a quiet but central location. Beautiful view (5th floor), NO LIFT. Modern floor heating system, high quality furniture, roof terrace. Kitchen with dish washer, micro wave, oven, large fridge and freezer, premium coffee maker, mixer, toaster. Bathroom with rain shower, separate floor heating.  Bed room separated from living room; 160x200m double bed. Washing machine, dryer. Electric sun shades.

name: Designapartment in Silicon Allee Campus
description:
Join an exclusive community of international entrepreneurs and live in one of our design apartments in the heart of Berlin.

The apartments are on the top two floors of the Silicon Allee startup campus, some with west-facing balconies so you will be treated to peace and quiet and beautiful sunsets over the Mitte rooftops. With an organic supermarket (Bio Company) in the building you almost never have to leave!

name: Wonderful altbau room
description: Our spare room is located between Mitte and the hip Wedding district. It is right in the middle of Gesundbrunnen, which means the moment you leave the appartment you are in the hustle and bustle of one of most mutlicultural places on Earth.

name: Cozy Apartment in Heart of Berlin
description:
My cozy appartment is at the 4th floor facing the courtyard: that's way there is so much light and it's so quite.
Lovely neighbourood very well connected with Alexanderplatz: from here you can go everywhere! 10 minutes walk from trendy Mitte.

The city park is almost right outside the front door. Various supermarkets are very close by. The bus station is 1 minute walk away and Rathaus Steglitz is a 15-20 minute walk.

name: Artsy Studio Apartment
description: This spacious studio-apartment is located at the hotspot of the subculture of Berlin: The famous Simon-Dach-Kiez of Friedrichshain which is among the hottest streets of Europe. It is unlikely to find a place in Germany with as many record shops, as many 2nd hand shops or as many restaurants or pubs as in the diameter to this apartment. The clubs, the concerts and the flea markets: Walking distance! Marvellous kitchen, bright bed room... Perfect place to start an adventure!

description: Renting out my cute little apartment in the center of Neukölln. I hope my colorful walls and the collection of decor from all over the world will give you a warm and homey feeling away from home. If you intent on staying for a longer time period (more then two weeks) you can message me about a discount.

name: Berlin Room close to Alexanderplatz
description:
Bright and spacious room to rent in the beloved Bötzowkiez in Prenzlauer Berg, within an easy reach to the key tourist attractions - tram line within a short walk will get you to Alexanderplatz in 10 minutes and from there, anywhere you like.

If you happen to be here for the Berlinale, the tram will take you to the main festival locations around Potsdamerplatz.


Hope you enjoy your Berlin experience, starting with a cosy stay in Prenzlauer Berg.

name: 3-Zimmer-Altbauwohnung (ACR)
description: Our holiday apartment is located in the former district of Tiergarten between Spandauer Schifffahrtskanal and Fritz Schloß-Park. In an old building, on the 2nd floor behind soundproof windows, you will find an apartment that offers you on 88 square meters of 3 bedrooms, a large kitchen-living room and a completely renovated bathroom. Two bus lines stop right outside the door, which will take you to the western center or the main train station with the government district behind it in a few minutes.

name: Family friendly home with a park-facing balcony
description:
A 100sqm family friendly apartment in the heart of Kreuzberg. We have all the things a small family visiting Berlin might need and offer a beautiful 4th floor apartment (with a lift) that has lots of light and a view over the park.

We are nearby to lots of cafes, public transport.

Excellent Wifi throughout.

name: Serviced Comfort Room im Herzen Berlin‘s
description: Welcome to the heart of Berlin-Kreuzberg! Our stylish serviced apartment offers a central location, the typical Berlin old building flair and an excellent connection to public transport. Experience the vibrant city life of the cultural metropolis of Berlin. They include a cozy double bedroom, workspace, relaxation chair and water dispenser, attached is a modern bathroom with rain shower. Book now for an unforgettable stay in Berlin!

description: Cosy, renovated and very bright 2 bedroom-flat of 55sm with a balcony in a charming old building in the hip and cute neighborhood Schillerkiez. Only 5 min. walking from 2 parks, it has the perfect infrastructure including a lot of nice restaurants, bars, and cafés perfect for brunch, 3 supermarkets, 2 subway stops, 1 bus stop and the S-Bahn nearby, and a food market on the weekend around the corner. You couldn't ask for more. Perfect for families with children.
